code: import axios from"axios";var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/api/persons';var getAllPersons=function getAllPersons(){return axios.get(baseUrl);};var newPerson=function newPerson(personObj){return axios.post(baseUrl,personObj);};var removePerson=function removePerson(personId){var personResource="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(personId);return axios.delete(personResource);};var putPerson=function putPerson(personObj,personId){var personResource="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(personId);return axios.put(personResource,personObj);};export default{getAllPersons:getAllPersons,newPerson:newPerson,removePerson:removePerson,putPerson:putPerson};
